title: Competency-Based Leadership Education for Minimally Invasive Surgery (MIS): Application of Scalable Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic surgical procedures and experience in team management
context.additional_context: Training combining MIS core competencies and leadership development for medical device sales managers.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain three fundamental MIS techniques
Learners identify two surgical procedural errors in real-time during team-based simulations
Learners complete smartphone-based educational modules at 90% or higher and achieve 80% or above on quizzes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
